channel.title: Smartwatch on Ahisahar Pretel Rodríguez
channel.description: Recent content in Smartwatch on Ahisahar Pretel Rodríguez

item.title: Android Trainer
item.description: Create an Android app for help coaches and users to realize power trainings using generic purpose devices, like a smartphone and a smartwatch. For realize the measurings of the trainings it uses the watch accelerometers and gyroscope. These sensors send the data to the smartphone. After it is processed it is shown in a user friendly user interface .
